clinical_study.brief_title: NovellusDx Cancer Early Detection Blood Test- Clinical Trial
clinical_study.official_title: Assessing the Ability of An Innovative Screening Method To Identify Proteomic Changes In Cancer Patients- Protocol

brief_summary.textblock: NovellusDx early detection test is a simple to perform blood test, which identifies the deregulated signaling pathways within the patient tumor based on protein secretion to the blood, thus enabling early stage disease signature detection. The investigators' current clinical trial is focused on proving the main feature of NovellusDx's Early Detection Test- discriminating between cancer patients and healthy subjects.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with a significant cancer fingerprint as measured by NovellusDX Cancer Early Detection test
primary_outcome.description: NovellusDX Cancer Early Detection test will identify participants with significant cancer fingerprint based on tumor protein secretion to the blood circulation in sick subjects.

study_pop.textblock: Healthy subjects and subjects with primary / relapsed lung cancer
